Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory45.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Celica, I heard the preparation of the Christmas Eve gala is coming along smoothly?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'It is, but the number of squads available to attend that day is...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "Well, times like this... We still have to make a proper showing even if we aren't getting as many attendees. Let those who'll be there enjoy themselves to the fullest.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'Absolutely.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Ring-ring, this is our next stop!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Ayla barges in out of nowhere with a camera after Hassen's and Celica's conversation."}
{3: 'She smiles at the camera before turning it toward the two of them.'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Now, if I can have a word from the two of you. I said "a word," but it\'s just a figure of speech. I\'m really hoping you\'ll at least say a sentence, or preferably a paragraph.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: "Hold on, Ayla, what are you doing? What's with the camera?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Did neither of you open the message I forwarded to you? Look, here it is.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ayla takes out her comms device from her bag and shows them.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: "...Whoa, that's interesting!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "It's a good idea indeed, not to mention a unique medium. Celica, see if we can arrange some satellites with surplus capacity later.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "You can discuss that afterward. What's important right now is the camera in your face!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: "You're right. But this is so sudden, I'm not sure where to begin...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "Then we'll have Asimov start first.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: "Asimov, you've been here the whole time?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: 'I... was grabbed when I got here. What farce are you up to this time?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "It's not a farce, it's a small entertainment event! Can I get you to say something for the camera, please?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: '...Do you always say "please" while clutching others\' sleeves?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "You know what... That's fine.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Then we'll start with you!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Sigh, well...', 4: '1'}
